items.title: Storing boolean mask in TFRecords
items.body:
since a boolean only represent a bit, is there an efficient way to serialize a boolean mask inside a tfrecord and can be deserialized in pure tensorflow?

For now I'm converting it to int and encode it to png which is better than serializing the int64 list, and is convenient as I can use tf.image.decode_png which is pure tensorflow.

Thanks.
